item.title: WCAG 2.1
item.description: WCAG 2.1 Quick Reference WCAG Quick Ref - A customizable quick reference to Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2 requirements (success criteria) and techniques. item.title: ATAG 2.0
item.description: Authoring tools are software and services that “authors” (web developers, designers, writers, etc.) use to produce web content (static web pages, dynamic web applications, etc.). ATAG Overview ATAG Overview ATAG Quick Guide ATAG Quick Guide ATAG Report Tool ATAG Quick Guide
